Title: Establishes the New York state preceptor stipend program
Summary: Establishes the New York state preceptor stipend program to be administered by the office of the professions, under which qualified preceptor clinicians shall receive a $5,000 stipend; provides for such funds to be distributed from the office of the professions account.
LawCode: Add ยง6505-f, Ed L; amd ยง97-nnn, St Fin L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the education law and the state finance law, in relation to establishing the New York state preceptor stipend program
